title: NG - Planet Mechanics Season 1
description:
Planet Mechanics is an English TV programme shown on the National Geographic Channel. The programme was broadcast on Sunday at 7:00pm. Series one has now finished.

 * 1. Air Propelled Sandwich
    * 2. Cow Power- In this episode, they built a bio gas plant which powers an oil extractor to extract oil from Rapeseed. The extracted oil is used to power a wheat dryer.
    * 3. Lake District Dilemma
    * 4. Solar Paella
    * 5. Electric Water Taxi- In this episode, Dick and Jem made a solar powered boat/water taxi for the busy canals of Venice, Italy.
    * 6. Surf Power - In this episode, they build a gadget that gets free energy from the ocean waves and lights an RV. Dick and Jem also made a generator which ran on human power by modifying a bicycle.
    * 7. Heavy Metal House - In this episode, they built a house using cargo shipping containers and solar power.
    * 8. Tree Powered Car- In this episode, they modified a pick-up truck to run on gases emitted by burning wood.
